mapper.insert: insert into user (userEmail, userName, userPwd, addrNo, addr, regDate) values (#{userEmail},#{userName},#{userPwd},#{addrNo}, #{addr}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d'))
mapper.select: select `userNo`, `userEmail`, `userName`, `userPwd`, `addrNo`, `addr`, `delYn`, DATE_FORMAT(`regDate`, '%Y-%m-%d') as regDate from user where userEmail = #{userEmail} and userPwd = #{userPwd} limit 1
select `userNo`, `userEmail`, `userName`, `userPwd`, `addrNo`, `addr`, `delYn`, DATE_FORMAT(`regDate`, '%Y-%m-%d') as regDate from user WHERE userEmail=#{userEmail}
mapper.update: update user set userPwd = #{userPwd}, where userEmail = #{userEmail}
